scripts.build: tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join('dist','src','index.js');if(!fs.existsSync(src)) throw new Error('Missing dist/src/index.js');const dest=path.join('dist','index.js');fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(dest),{recursive:true});fs.writeFileSync(dest, 'require(\'./src/index.js\');\n');" && tsc --project tsconfig.libs.json && tsc --project tsconfig.payments.json
